sentences.english: Frontispiece illustration on the page facing the title page of a book.
sentences.chinese: 卷首插图和扉页照面的页上插图。

sentences.english: On the flyleaf was an inscription to me.
sentences.chinese: 在扉页上题字是送给我的。

sentences.english: Iagree with the judgment of The Washington Post that the publishers quote onthe cover.
sentences.chinese: 我同意《华盛顿邮报》引用书扉页上的判断。

sentences.english: By 1598, his name had become a selling point and began to appear on the title pages.
sentences.chinese: 到1598年，他的名字已经成为卖点并出现在扉页。

sentences.english: Then turn the page, on the fate of yellow will it binding very awkward.
sentences.chinese: 遂翻开那发黄的扉页，命运将它装订得极为拙劣。

sentences.english: On the flyleaf under the heading, "My pledge , " he had written these words.
sentences.chinese: 他论文的扉页上有一句话“纪念我亲爱的妈妈。”

sentences.english: On the flyleaf of his thesis is a line:"To the memory of my dear mother."
sentences.chinese: 他论文的扉页上有一句话”纪念我亲爱的妈妈。

sentences.english: Pictures of old days, like yellow, and in the cover page of memory.
sentences.chinese: 旧时光，好像泛黄的照片，珍藏在记忆的扉页。

sentences.english: What do you see on the title page?
sentences.chinese: 在扉页上你都看到了什么？

definition: name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
the back cover of a book
annotations made in a book/fig. remarks and comments/to have an opinion on everything
